page.title: 06THE AGRICULTURAL SHOW
page.content:
Every year in Ashton Court there is the{THE NORTH SOMERSET AGRICULTURAL {SHOW}.There are dodgems,big wheels and mini electric trains.
. Cows,pigs and horses are for sale. One of the main {EVENTS}is the tractor pulling. Men from all round the country soup up tractors to about{ {1000 hp }.Then they have to pull 1 ton on the back of a trailer as far has they can. The winner gets a cup and Â£100 . Farmers also come to buy tractors,ploughs and harvesters. It nearly always rains!. When I went it tipped down.
